Body: By this I mean have there been any project which analyze the evolution of specific constructs, specific words, etc., and how the language has changed over time?
Title: Have there been any significant attempts to map the evolution of English?

OwnerUser.AboutMe: I am currently a junior at Penn State pursuing a B.Phil. in Linguistics and a B.S. in Psychology with minors in Arabic and Statistics. I plan to graduate in 2015 to pursue a Ph.D. in linguistics.
